name: Arcane Insight
text: Magical insight helps you evade attacks.
prerequisites: Arcane Shield, arcane spellcaster, caster level 10th, worshiper of Nethys.
benefit: Whenever you use Arcane Shield, you also gain a +1 insight bonus to AC for 1 round.
text_zh: 奥术魔法的力量帮助你洞悉对手的招数。
prerequisites_zh: 信仰内希斯，奥能之盾，施法者等级10。
benefit_zh: 当你启动奥能之盾专长时，你还会在一轮内在AC上获得+1洞察加值。
